main event: An unidentified spherical object was observed over Santarém, Portugal, on 16 May 1952, displaying peculiar maneuvers before exploding and breaking into fragments.
interesting points: The object was first seen as a brilliant sphere in the sky., Witnesses reported the object as having a silvery appearance., After observation, the object exploded and fragmented into several parts., Some fragments appeared to remain stationary before disappearing., The area of the sighting is a popular resort and always in the public eye.
witness description: Details were reported by the local newspaper and are based on eyewitness accounts.
